# 2024-01-01 News - Work

## New Authentication Standards Published
**Source:** owasp.org | **Time:** 09:15
OWASP published updated guidelines for JWT token handling in web applications. Key changes include recommendations for shorter token lifetimes and improved refresh token rotation strategies.

**Source:** internal | **Time:** 14:30
Q4 productivity metrics show 15% improvement in sprint velocity. Authentication module completion ahead of schedule.
